description:
Works to trees in rear garden subject to John Spencer Square No.119 TPO 1991. 

 Lime (T1) -      Crown lift 4m, crown thin 35%, clear                  building by 2m and deadwood 

 Lime (T2) -      Crown lift 4m, crown thin 35%, clear                  building by 2m and deadwood 

 Lime (T3) -      Crown lift 4m, crown thin 35%, clear                  building by 2m and deadwood 

 Lime (T4) -      Crown lift 6m, crown thin 35%, remove                  epicormic growth and deadwood 

 Lime (T5) -      Crown lift 6m, crown thin 35%, remove                  epicormic growth and deadwood 

 Maple (T6) -     Crown lift 3m 

 Cherry (T7) -    Crown lift 4m and crown thin 25% 

 Sycamore (T8) -  Remove epicormic growth and deadwood 

 Chestnut (T9) -  Crown lift 5m, crown thin 25% and deadwood 

 Sycamore (T10) - Light crown thin 20%, remove epicormic                  growth and deadwood 

 Cherry (T11) -   Crown lift 3m, deadwood 

 Hornbeam (T12) - Crown lift 3m 

 Lime (T13) -     Crown lift 4m, crown thin 30% and deadwood 

 Sycamore (T14) - Crown lift 3m, crown thin 30% and deadwood 

 Cherry (T15) -   Crown lift 3m 

 Maple (T16) -    Crown lift 3m and deadwood 

 Oak (T17) -      Crown lift 3m and deadwood 

 Sorbus (T18) -   Crown lift 2m and deadwood
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
